Package asap.textengine

Engine that prints text.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TextEmbodiment
    Provides a way to set a text.
    TextOutput
    Used to display the text of a TextSpeechUnit
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmbodimentTextOutput
    TextOutput implementation that sends the text directly to a TextEmbodiment.
    JLabelTextEmbodiment
    Take care of its own loading from XML.
    JLabelTextOutput
    TextOutput that prints the text to a JLabel.
    StdoutTextOutput
    TextOutput that prints the text to the stdout
    TextPlanner
    The TextPlanner is used to plan SpeechBehaviours.
    TimedAbstractTextUnit
    Skeleton implementation for TimedTextUnits.
    TimedSpeechTextUnit
    Implements a SpeechBehaviour by sending the speech text at a certain SPEECH_RATE through a text output channel.

Package asap.textengine Description

Engine that prints text. Used as alternative to the speech engine to render speech behaviors. Can also be used in combination with the speech engine, for example to provide subtitles for speech.
